resources.string: Sorry ,Your Answer Is wrong please try Again

Example of answers may help {targetCalories : 2000( target for one day) , diet : vegetarian( diet that the meal plan has to adhere to, e.g. "vegetarian", "vegan", "paleo" etc.) , exclude(A comma-separated list of allergens)}
What is the caloric target for one day?
Enter a diet that the meal plan has to adhere to,
A comma-separated list of allergens or ingredients that must be excluded.
